export var NotificationActionTypes={GET_LIST:"GET_LIST",GET_LIST_SUCCESS:"GET_LIST_SUCCESS",GET_LIST_ERROR:"GET_LIST_ERROR",GET_NEWEST:"GET_NEWEST",GET_NEWEST_SUCCESS:"GET_NEWEST_SUCCESS",GET_NEWEST_ERROR:"GET_NEWEST_ERROR",CREATE:"CREATE",CREATE_SUCCESS:"CREATE_SUCCESS",CREATE_ERROR:"CREATE_ERROR",UPDATE:"UPDATE",UPDATE_SUCCESS:"UPDATE_SUCCESS",UPDATE_ERROR:"UPDATE_ERROR",UPDATE_ALL:"UPDATE_ALL",UPDATE_ALL_SUCCESS:"UPDATE_ALL_SUCCESS",UPDATE_ALL_ERROR:"UPDATE_ALL_ERROR",DELETE:"DELETE",DELETE_SUCCESS:"DELETE_SUCCESS",DELETE_ERROR:"DELETE_ERROR",DELETE_ALL:"DELETE_ALL",DELETE_ALL_SUCCESS:"DELETE_ALL_SUCCESS",DELETE_ALL_ERROR:"DELETE_ALL_ERROR",CLEAR_DETAIL:"CLEAR_DETAIL",CLEAR_STATE:"CLEAR_STATE"};Object.keys(NotificationActionTypes).forEach(function(key){NotificationActionTypes[key]="NOTIFICATION_".concat(NotificationActionTypes[key]);});var onClearDetail=function onClearDetail(){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.CLEAR_DETAIL};};var onClearState=function onClearState(){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.CLEAR_STATE};};/**
 *
 * get list
 */var onGetNewest=function onGetNewest(payload){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.GET_NEWEST,payload:payload};};var onGetNewestSuccess=function onGetNewestSuccess(detail,total){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.GET_NEWEST_SUCCESS,payload:{detail:detail,total:total}};};var onGetNewestError=function onGetNewestError(error){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.GET_NEWEST_ERROR,payload:error};};var onGetList=function onGetList(payload){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.GET_LIST,payload:payload};};var onGetListSuccess=function onGetListSuccess(list,total){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.GET_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:{list:list,total:total}};};var onGetListError=function onGetListError(error){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.GET_LIST_ERROR,payload:error};};/**
 *
 * create
 */var onCreate=function onCreate(data){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.CREATE,payload:data};};var onCreateSuccess=function onCreateSuccess(detail){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.CREATE_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onCreateError=function onCreateError(error){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.CREATE_ERROR,payload:error};};/**
 *
 * update
 */var onUpdate=function onUpdate(id,data,params){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.UPDATE,payload:{id:id,data:data,params:params}};};var onUpdateSuccess=function onUpdateSuccess(detail){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.UPDATE_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onUpdateError=function onUpdateError(error){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.UPDATE_ERROR,payload:error};};var onUpdateAll=function onUpdateAll(data,params){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.UPDATE_ALL,payload:{data:data,params:params}};};var onUpdateAllSuccess=function onUpdateAllSuccess(payload){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.UPDATE_ALL_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};var onUpdateAllError=function onUpdateAllError(error){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.UPDATE_ALL_ERROR,payload:error};};/**
 *
 * delete
 */var onDelete=function onDelete(id,params){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.DELETE,payload:{id:id,params:params}};};var onDeleteSuccess=function onDeleteSuccess(detail){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.DELETE_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onDeleteError=function onDeleteError(error){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.DELETE_ERROR,payload:error};};var onDeleteAll=function onDeleteAll(id,params){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.DELETE_ALL,payload:{id:id,params:params}};};var onDeleteAllSuccess=function onDeleteAllSuccess(detail){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.DELETE_ALL_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onDeleteAllError=function onDeleteAllError(error){return{type:NotificationActionTypes.DELETE_ALL_ERROR,payload:error};};var NotificationActions={onGetNewest:onGetNewest,onGetNewestSuccess:onGetNewestSuccess,onGetNewestError:onGetNewestError,onGetList:onGetList,onGetListSuccess:onGetListSuccess,onGetListError:onGetListError,onCreate:onCreate,onCreateSuccess:onCreateSuccess,onCreateError:onCreateError,onUpdate:onUpdate,onUpdateSuccess:onUpdateSuccess,onUpdateError:onUpdateError,onDelete:onDelete,onDeleteSuccess:onDeleteSuccess,onDeleteError:onDeleteError,onUpdateAll:onUpdateAll,onUpdateAllSuccess:onUpdateAllSuccess,onUpdateAllError:onUpdateAllError,onDeleteAll:onDeleteAll,onDeleteAllSuccess:onDeleteAllSuccess,onDeleteAllError:onDeleteAllError,onClearDetail:onClearDetail,onClearState:onClearState};export default NotificationActions;
